name: market for diesel-electric generating set, 10MW | diesel-electric generating set, 10MW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9487/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'diesel-electric generating set, 10MW', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;Thisis an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of an diesel-electric generating set. The infrasrtucture has a capacity of 10MW. It is used for generating electricity for oil and natural gas exploration and production.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
